title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 82 - Enterprise Risk Management And Own Risk And Solvency Assessment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 82 - Enterprise Risk Management And Own Risk And Solvency Assessment

State Regulations
§ 82.1 - Definitions
§ 82.2 - Enterprise risk management
§ 82.3 - Own risk and solvency assessment
§ 82.4 - Group-wide supervision of internationally active insurance groups
§ 82.5 - Group capital calculation
§ 82.6 - Exemption from disclosure
§ 82.7 - Exemptions from electronic filing and submission requirements

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 82

Statutory authority: Financial Services Law, §§
202, 302; Insurance Law, §§ 110, 301, 309, 316, 1115, 1501, 1503, 1504[c], 1604, 1702, 1717; arts. 15, 16, 17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
